summary.conference_title: 12th International Conference on Software Defined Systems (SDS2025)
summary.conference_theme: Exploration of software-defined everything in various domains including networks, systems, security, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence.

submission_guidelines.manuscript_format: 10-point font using the IEEE 8.5" x 11" two-column format
submission_guidelines.review_process: All submissions are peer-reviewed by at least two reviewers.

areas_of_interest: Software-Defined Cloud, Edge, and Fog Environments
Security, Privacy, and Trust in Software-Defined Systems

general_co_chairs: Larbi Boubchir, University of Paris 8, France
Tamara Zhukabayeva, L.N Eurasian National University, Kazakhstan
Jaime Lloret, Universitat Politècnica de València, Spain

summary.additional_info: Accepted papers will be published in conference proceedings and made accessible through major digital libraries, including IEEE Xplore.
